channel.name: Detroit Public TV US
channel.title: Pinkalicious & Peterrific
channel.desc: Pinkalicious paints her friends' faces, but there's one problem - the paint won't wipe off in time for school picture day; Pinkalicious and Peter lose their teddy bears when they float away in paper boats.
